flavorText: "The wilds are a garden tended by divine hands."

foreignData.name: Tempeldienerin der Karametra
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um so viel {G}, wie deine Hingabe zu Grün beträgt. (Jedes {G} in den Manakosten von bleibenden Karten, die du kontrollierst, erhöht deine Hingabe zu Grün um eins.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Los bosques son un jardín atendido por manos divinas".

foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega una cantidad de {G} a tu reserva de maná igual a tu devoción al verde. (Cada {G} en los costes de maná de los permanentes que controlas cuenta para tu devoción al verde.)

foreignData.flavorText: « La nature est un jardin entretenu par des mains divines. »
foreignData.name: Acolyte de Karametra
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez à votre réserve une quantité de {G} égale à votre dévotion au vert. (Chaque {G} dans les coûts de mana des permanents que vous contrôlez compte pour votre dévotion au vert.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Le terre selvagge sono un giardino di cui si prendono cura mani divine."
foreignData.name: Accolita di Karametra
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi alla tua riserva di mana un ammontare di {G} pari alla tua devozione al verde. (La tua devozione al verde è la somma dei {G} nel costo di mana dei permanenti che controlli.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「荒野とは、神の手によって手入れされた庭である。」

foreignData.flavorText: "As terras selvagens são um jardim cuidado por mãos divinas."

name: Karametra's Acolyte
originalText: {T}: Add an amount of {G} to your mana pool equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

rulings.text: The activated ability is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Numeric mana symbols ({0}, {1}, and so on) in mana costs of permanents you control don’t count toward your devotion to any color.
Mana symbols in the text boxes of permanents you control don’t count toward your devotion to any color.
Hybrid mana symbols, monocolored hybrid mana symbols, and Phyrexian mana symbols do count toward your devotion to their color(s).

If an activated ability or triggered ability has an effect that depends on your devotion to a color, you count the number of mana symbols of that color among the mana costs of permanents you control as the ability resolves. The permanent with that ability will be counted if it’s still on the battlefield at that time.

text: {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
